attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: restore democracy to the people, return integrity to the rights of the individual,remove the intrusion of the state both national and local, allow the return of admiration and respect of those who suffered to give us the freedoms we enjoyed before this government, allow us once again to be truly british, consign blair to hell.

rejection.details: The title should be a call for action, not a name.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
